Episodes.Title: A Beautiful Day
Episodes.Plot: It?s been 6 months since LaGuerta?s murder ? and Dexter is still managing life as a dad, brother, and serial killer. Debra now works as a PI for a private firm and Batista has replaced her as Lieutenant. Meanwhile, Miami Metro investigates the murder of a man who has had pieces of his brain removed.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sex scenes,violence,drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Every Silver Lining...
Episodes.Plot: Miami Metro continues their hunt for the Brain Surgeon, while Dr. Vogel enlists Dexter to do her bidding based on her own personal experience with her previous patients. Debra continues to track down her PI case and has to take matters into her own hands.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sex scenes,violence,drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: What's Eating Dexter Morgan?
Episodes.Plot: Dexter continues his manhunt for the Brain Surgeon. Dr. Vogel tries to prove to Dexter that he?s perfect as a psychopath. Debra?s PTSD kicks in and she makes a desperate plea to confess to LaGuerta?s murder.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sex scenes,violence,drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Scar Tissue
Episodes.Plot: Dexter tracks down another potential serial killer from Dr. Vogel?s list. Quinn celebrates passing the Sergeant?s exam by defending Debra?s honor in a fight. Dr. Vogel begins treating Debra for her PTSD.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Horror,violence,sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: This Little Piggy
Episodes.Plot: Dr. Vogel gets abducted by the Brain Surgeon, while Dexter and Debra try and rescue her. Masuka finds out he has a daughter.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Horror,violence,sex scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Bethany Joy Lenz, Dora Madison Burge, Aaron McCusker

Episodes.Title: A Little Reflection
Episodes.Plot: Dexter monitors a young psychopath to see if he is suited for his table. Dexter and Debra finally get back to normal.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Horror,violence,sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Dress Code
Episodes.Plot: Dexter hunts down Hannah to figure out why she?s back in Miami. Dexter also takes on a protégé and starts teaching him the Code.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Horror,violence,sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Are We There Yet?
Episodes.Plot: Dexter tracks down his protégé in the belief that he murdered his neighbor. Meanwhile, Dexter tries to help Hannah escape the country.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Horror,violence,sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Make Your Own Kind of Music
Episodes.Plot: Dexter investigates a murder that hits close to home. Meanwhile, Dr. Vogel gets the surprise of her life when someone from her past returns.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Horror,violence,sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Goodbye Miami
Episodes.Plot: Dexter enlists Dr. Vogel's help to lure the Brain Surgeon to a location in order to get him on the table. Later, an important person in Dexter's life is murdered before his eyes.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Horror,violence,sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Monkey In a Box
Episodes.Plot: Dexter is torn between fleeing the country with Hannah and Harrison, and taking Saxon out once and for all.

Episodes.Title: Remember the Monsters?
Episodes.Plot: With a hurricane threatening Miami, Dexter becomes determined to end things his way.
Episodes.GuestStars: Yvonne Strahovski, Sean Patrick Flanery, Amy Pietz
